name: The Super Size-inator 3000
description:
Play as a reclusive scientist caught in a devastating error. The scientist's magnum opus, The Super Size-inator 3000, has reduced him to the size of a mouse. Locate batteries throughout the lab to power his machines and eventually return to normal size... or larger.
